div.p: The initiative for this work stemmed from a series of Workshops on Ocean Acidification financed by the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences. Subsequent work by the lead authors was supported by a Grant from Hasselblad Foundation. Earlier versions of the manuscript were improved substantially by comments from Wendy Broadgate and Per Nilsson. We wish to express our gratitude to all. Cr√©pin also acknowledges a generous Grant from the Ebba and Sven Schwartz Foundation.
